items.title: Qu'est-ce exactement que HowToExplain et comment fonctionne-t-il ?
items.description: HowToExplain is an AI-powered tool that helps make complex topics easy to understand. It uses advanced AI to analyze content and generate clear, audience-appropriate explanations with visual aids and examples.

items.title: Qui peut bénéficier de HowToExplain ?
items.description: HowToExplain est utile pour les enseignants, les étudiants, les parents, les créateurs de contenu et les professionnels qui doivent expliquer des concepts complexes à différents publics. Il est particulièrement utile dans l'éducation, la rédaction technique et la communication professionnelle.

items.title: What types of content can I explain with HowToExplain?
items.description: You can explain virtually any complex topic - from scientific concepts to technical documentation, academic subjects to business concepts. The AI adapts the explanation to match your audience's understanding level.

items.title: How does the audience adaptation feature work?
items.description: Simply select your target audience (kids, beginners, or professionals), and our AI automatically adjusts the language, examples, and complexity level of the explanation to match their understanding level.

items.title: What formats of explanation does HowToExplain provide?
items.description: HowToExplain generates explanations in multiple formats including text, bullet points, diagrams, mind maps, and visual aids. This multi-format approach helps ensure better understanding for different learning styles.

items.title: Can I save and share my explanations?
items.description: Yes! You can save explanations to your personal knowledge library, share them with others, and even generate different versions of the same explanation for different audiences.
